atmosphere.internal

This module contains numeric methods. Each method aims to do one iteration over the task.

Optimization problem f(p) -> min, where p is discrete probability distribution with k elements. f = u(Wp), W - matrix(n rows, k columns), u - convex function.

void mix(T)(Matrix!(const(T)) WTransposed, in T[] p, T[] mixture);
mixture = Wp

void gradientDescentIteration(alias grad, T)(Matrix!(const(T)) WTransposed, T[] p, T[] mixture, T[] pi, T[] xi, T[] gamma, T[] c, in bool delegate(T, T) nothrow @nogc tolerance = (a, b) => false);
One iteration of gradient descent optimization algorithm.

Params:
grad ∇u(ω)
Matrix!(const(T)) WTransposed transposed version of W. k rows, n columns.
T[] p discrete probability distribution with, length = k.
T[] mixture temporary array, length = n.
T[] pi temporary array, length = n.
T[] xi temporary array, length = n.
T[] gamma temporary array, length = n.
T[] c temporary array, length = k.
bool delegate(T, T) nothrow @nogc tolerance Defines an early termination condition. Receives the current upper and lower bounds on the root. The delegate must return true when these bounds are acceptable.

void coordinateDescentIteration(alias grad, T)(Matrix!(const(T)) WTransposed, T[] p, T[] mixture, T[] pi, T[] xi, T[] gamma, in bool delegate(T, T) nothrow @nogc tolerance = (a, b) => false);
k iterations of coordinate descent optimization algorithm.

For better performance permute rows of WTransposed rows and corresponding elements of p. Similar rows (in context of u) of WTransposed should be held far from each other.

Params:
grad ∇u(ω)
Matrix!(const(T)) WTransposed transposed version of W. n columns, k rows.
T[] p discrete probability distribution with, length = k.
T[] mixture temporary array, length = n.
T[] pi temporary array, length = n.
T[] xi temporary array, length = n.
T[] gamma temporary array, length = n.
bool delegate(T, T) nothrow @nogc tolerance Defines an early termination condition. Receives the current upper and lower bounds on the root. The delegate must return true when these bounds are acceptable.

void coordinateDescentIterationPartial(alias PartialDerivative, T)(Matrix!(const(T)) WTransposed, T[] p, T[] mixture, T[] pi, in bool delegate(T, T) nothrow @nogc tolerance = (a, b) => false);
k iterations of coordinate descent optimization algorithm.

For better performance permute rows of WTransposed rows and corresponding elements of p. Similar rows (in context of u) of WTransposed should be held far from each other.

Params:
PartialDerivative du/dω_1, where du/dω_j = du/dω_1, 1 <= j <= n.
Matrix!(const(T)) WTransposed transposed version of W. n columns, k rows.
T[] p discrete probability distribution with, length = k.
T[] mixture temporary array, length = n.
T[] pi temporary array, length = n.
bool delegate(T, T) nothrow @nogc tolerance Defines an early termination condition. Receives the current upper and lower bounds on the root. The delegate must return true when these bounds are acceptable.
